[PDF] Model Context Protocol (MCP): Landscape, Security Threats, and ...
Model Context Protocol (MCP): Landscape, Security Threats ...

summary: The understanding of the Model Context Protocol (MCP) evolved across iterations from recognizing it as an emerging open standard for integrating AI assistants with external data sources to a rapidly evolving standard that simplifies AI model integration. The initial focus on standardization and security threats expanded to include context exchange, client-server architecture, and real-world applications.
